remarks: Weak version of ~ ax-10 from which we can prove any ~ ax-10 instance not involving wff variables or bundling.  Uses only Tarski's FOL axiom schemes.  (Contributed by NM, 9-Apr-2017.)
statement:
ax10w.1 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
ax10w $p |- ( -. A. x ph -> A. x -. A. x ph ) $.
$d ph y $.
$d ps x $.
$d x y $.
